about-text.about-2: Hey. How are you? My name is Onur.
about-text.about-3: I am a self-taught web developer / designer. I studied Japanese Language in Ankara University in Turkey.
about-text.about-4: I have over 2 years of work experience in web development. I speak Japanese, English and Turkish
